title: Best of The Herd: 01/14/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 01/14/2019
description:
Colin thinks that the Patriots will never be more vulnerable than they are right now so the Chiefs better take advantage.  He says Cowboys fans should get used to seasons ending like this because this is basically the ceiling for Dallas with Dak Prescott and Jason Garrett.  Plus, 4x Super Bowl Champion Terry Bradshaw comes in studio to talk about all four NFL divisional round playoff games.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
